<section class="pub-topic-section" id="topic-cosmology">
<h3>Cosmology</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="#paper-3">Strong lensing cosmography using binary-black-hole mergers: Prospects for the near future</a></li>
<li><a href="#paper-13">Primordial magnetic fields and modified recombination histories</a></li>
<li><a href="#paper-19">Strong-lensing cosmography using third-generation gravitational-wave detectors</a></li>

<section class="pub-topic-section" id="topic-recombination">
<h3>Recombination</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="#paper-13">Primordial magnetic fields and modified recombination histories</a></li>
<li><a href="#paper-63">Stability of small-scale baryon perturbations during cosmological recombination</a></li>
</ul>
</section>

<script>
(() => {
  const filters = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.topic-filter[data-topic]'));
  const entries = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.pub-entry'));
  const status = document.getElementById('pub-filter-status');
  const clear = document.getElementById('pub-filter-clear');
  if (!filters.length || !entries.length) return;
  const selected = new Set();
  const update = () => {
    let visible = 0;
    for (const entry of entries) {
      const topics = (entry.dataset.topics || '').split('|').filter(Boolean);
      const show = Array.from(selected).every(t => topics.includes(t));
      entry.hidden = !show;
      if (show) visible += 1;
    }
    for (const f of filters) {
      f.classList.toggle('is-active', selected.has(f.dataset.topic));
      f.setAttribute('aria-pressed', selected.has(f.dataset.topic) ? 'true' : 'false');
    }
    if (!status) return;
    if (!selected.size) {
      status.textContent = `Showing all ${entries.length} papers.`;
      return;
    }
    status.textContent = `Showing ${visible} papers for: ${Array.from(selected).join(', ')}.`;
  };
  for (const f of filters) {
    f.addEventListener('click', (ev) => {
      ev.preventDefault();
      const topic = f.dataset.topic;
      if (!topic) return;
      if (selected.has(topic)) selected.delete(topic);
      else selected.add(topic);
      update();
    });
  }
  if (clear) {
    clear.addEventListener('click', () => {
      selected.clear();
      update();
    });
  }
  update();
})();
</script>
<!-- AUTOGENERATED PUBLICATIONS: END -->
